projects.name: Picshare
projects.desc: An online image editing platform with real-time collaboration. Users can hop in and out of drawing rooms, save images to their profile, and reload them for continued editing in the future.

projects.name: Path Tracing Renderer
projects.desc: A rendering algorithm that uses computer graphics math techniques to generate realistic visuals! Features include: Texture / Alpha / Normal Mapping, Area light sources, Reflection & Refraction, Depth of Field, Importance sampling, Accelerated rendering through use of Bounded Volue Hierarchies (BVH)

projects.name: BugByte
projects.desc: A top-down 2D pixel-art dungeon-crawler roguelite creature-catching game. Build an ever-changing team of quirky creatures and keep them alive through strategic combat as you traverse deeper into the Drive to uncover the mysteries of the plague.
